metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12430 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in qemuDomainGetStatsIOThread in qemu/qemu_driver.cin libvirt 4.10.0 though 6.x before 6.1.0. A memory leak was found in thevirDomainListGetStats libvirt API that is responsible for retrieving domainstatistics when managing QEMU guests. This flaw allows unprivileged userswith a read-only connection to cause a memory leak in the domstats command,resulting in a potential denial of service.

criterions.comment: libvirt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
